body_html:
The error messages say that cudnn.h cannot be found. You will need to either reinstall cudnn, or if it is already installed make sure the paths set pointing to cudnn are correct.

I am sure there is “cudnn.h” in the corresponding directory, but I still get an error.

body:
> The error messages say that cudnn.h cannot be found. You will need to either reinstall cudnn, or if it is already installed make sure the paths set pointing to cudnn are correct.


I am sure there is “cudnn.h” in the corresponding directory, but I still get an error.
